notes.text:
Really late season but got there. Sogen is the preferred skill for most people, but this deck attracted me as a pure control deck, and imo it's better to go for either consistency with Balance, or Mind Scan. And I feel like the latter is significantly better, as playing around backrow, and destroying the right set cards are critical to your success; if you like Sams, try it for 5 games or so and see how you like it. 

Enishi is great and honestly feels like a TCG card; with more Six Sam support (Grandmaster, Kizan, etc), Shogun might be more preferred to win games quickly, but Enishi will always be safer and more consistent to go for. Some notes: https://pastebin.com/3FkPRVn8
